CyKick CS

The active ingredient is Cyfluthrin It is a synthetic pyrethroid that attacks the central nervous system of target pests.

Cy-kick CS liquid concentrate insecticide provides 90 days of full-throttle killing power, controlling insects indoors and outdoors. With a broad spectrum label including spiders, ants, mosquitoes, bees, cockroaches, crickets, fleas, flies, bed bugs, silverfish, ticks, wasps, wood infesting borers and more, you donâ€™t have to pick and choose between different insecticides for different pests.
